commit message: Continue with version 1.1 (SNAPSHOT).
Reorganize about dialog.
Allow for forward slashes in idents

Manifest: Set minSdkVersion to 7 (Android 2.2)

Due to using ActionBarSherlock we have to rise the
minSdkVersion to at least 7.

Refs #124
Update CHANGELOG.
Minor updates to README file
Minor update to README file
Replaced lowercase letters by uppercase ones on application name
Fixed typo in LICENSE filename
Added myself to the list of contributors
Added support for LED light notification on nickname highlight
IRCService: Extracting constants and reordering class members.
POM: Set android dependency to version 4.1.1.4.
Mavenize test project and remove old test script.
Update robotium to 3.5.1.
ScenarioHelper.connectToServer(): Don't just wait for connection but for successful server login.
ServerListScenarios.testAddingAndRemovingServer(): Don't assert on number of items in list (because of 'add server' item) but on existing or non-existing server name in list.
Test project manifest: Use same sdk levels as application.
Update test project classpath to include new robotium version 3.5.1
Update ActionBarSherlock dependency to version 4.2.
Theme: Remove absForceOverflow property. Not supported anymore in ActionBarSherlock 4.2. Fixes #129.
Update support library to version 11.
MessageListView: Set transcript mode to normal (Only automatically scroll if the last item is visible). Fixes #119.
Allow copy&paste of text in ConversationActivity. Fixes #118.

New default settings. Fixes #116.

* Colorize Nicknames: On
* (mIRC) Colors: On
* Show message colors: On
* Show graphical smilies: On
* Autocorrect input: On
Update copyright line (2009-2013).
Strings in application.xml are not translatable. Refs #102.
Build against platform version 17 (And use maven plugin 3.5.0).
Manifest: Allow backup of app.
arrays.xml: Move strings to strings.xml and mark non-translatable values. Refs #102.
Move conversation.xml from layout folder to drawable folder (This is a drawable and no layout). Refs #102.
Charsets are not translatable. Refs #102.
Settings keys/values are not translatable (settings.xml). Refs #102.
Update language files.
MessageListView: Background is now in drawable folder. (Funny that this worked at all).
Drop GoogleTV support again (Remove android.hardware.touchscreen=false).
Remove eclipse settings files.

Add setting to debug IRC traffic. Refs #91.

After this setting has been enabled all IRC traffic will be written
to the verbose log (only for new connections).
README: It's 2013!

Update all broadcast sending to use LocalBroadcastManager.

This breaks a lot as the receiving part is not changed yet. But this is
a branch anyways ... so let's break stuff!
Add an option to show seconds in the timestamp

Initial fork movement.

I hacked on some things, changed up the README, and have done some Fun Things. See the README for what I changed this round.

Update CONTRIBUTORS

Added myself to the contributors list. I might change this around later.

Clean up rename

master global class renamed to further avoid confusion in code.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/indrora/Atomic

Updated graphics

There's now 500% more Holo in this commit.

Also, remade the icon.

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/local-broadcasts'

Conflicts:
application/src/indrora/atomic/Atomic.java
Resolved:
indrora.atomic.Atomic does not need to be updated, as the conflicting
line was actually commented out to begin with.
adding long-click listening support
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/indrora/Atomic
undo the merge at @accd1f because I was an idiot.

Added rudimentary theme support

Theme support is NOW! Woo! The documentation is nonexistent, and some
of the details are sketchy, but IT WORKS!

Included is the Base16 Monokai theme. Later to come might include
Zenburn and others! Yay!

This required some massive restructuring of how Messages are handled,
and how their colors are managed. In this case, a new Sub-Enum is created,
the Message.MessageColor enum, which defines a bunch of possible values.

Later on, I need to document all these.
Cosmetic changes.
